column1: ConditionsPermittee shall comply with all existing traffic controlsand parking restrictions. Permittee shall also complywith any additional restrictions under the SpecialTraffic Permit issued by SFMTA. For informationrelated to construction traffic restrictions pleasereference the latest edition of Regulations for Workingin San Francisco Streets, the Blue Book. To downloada copy of the Blue Book, please visithttps://www.sfmta.com/services/streets-sidewalks/construction-regulations.A minimum four (4) foot wide clear pedestrian walkwaymust be maintained at all times.Pursuant to Article 29 of the San Francisco PoliceCode, a Night Noise Permit for operation in the PublicRight-of-Way shall be required for work that createsany noise 5dBA above the ambient noise level of thatarea at the nearest property plane.Event/Operation:Accessing Manholes in order to verify conduit routePermit Linear Footage440Elements of OccupancyTRUCKSFrom:8/21/2017 9:00AMStart Time9:00AMTo:8/22/2017 4:00PMEnd Time4:00PMNeed to call for InspectionNeed to post tow-away signTo activate and register this permit for towing, followthe tow-away sign activation and photo uploadprocess.
